name: HEMO_DATA_VALUES
description: This table contains the hemodynamic measurement values collected during an invasive procedure performed in a catheterization lab. The table only includes the values selected by the performing physician in Study Review for the result report.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HEMO_FIELD_FORM_COMP_ID
columns.description: Stores the field definition for this hemodynamic measurement value.

columns.name: HEMO_DISPLAY_VALUE
columns.description: Stores a string representation of the hemodynamic data value including all components.

columns.name: HEMO_PHASE_KEY
columns.description: Identifies the phase of the procedure when this value was measured. The value in this phase key item corresponds to the HEMO_PHASES_KEY column in the HEMO_DATA_PHASES table.

columns.name: HEMO_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates how the value was entered.

columns.name: HEMO_VALUE
columns.description: Numeric item for the value for simple numeric fields.

columns.name: HEMO_SYSTOLIC
columns.description: Numeric item for the systolic portion of a pressure field.

columns.name: HEMO_DIASTOLIC
columns.description: Numeric item for the diastolic portion of a pressure field.

columns.name: HEMO_MEAN
columns.description: Numeric item for the mean portion of a pressure field.

columns.name: HEMO_END_DIASTOLIC
columns.description: Numeric item for the end diastolic portion of a pressure field.

columns.name: HEMO_FIELD_DAT
columns.description: Stores the contact for the field definition of this hemodynamic measurement value.

columns.name: HEMO_FIELD_DATE_REAL
columns.description: Stores the unique contact date in decimal format for the field definition of this hemodynamic measurement value in this row. This corresponds to the CONTACT_DATE_REAL column in the NESTED_FORM_COMPONENT_VER table.  The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.
